summary: This document appears to be an email or internal communication summarizing a witness account from 2001. The witness describes visiting a nightclub with Matthew John Walker, where they saw individuals believed to be Jeffrey Epstein and Prince Andrew, and observed Prince Andrew dancing with a woman.

persons.name: Matthew John Walker
persons.context: Accompanied the witness to Tramp nightclub in 2001 and is described as the person who trafficked the witness. He spoke to individuals believed to be Epstein and Prince Andrew.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the individuals Matthew John Walker spoke to at Tramp nightclub in 2001, according to the witness's belief.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the individuals Matthew John Walker spoke to at Tramp nightclub in 2001. The witness also observed him dancing with a woman.

connections.description: Walker is described as speaking to Epstein at Tramp nightclub in 2001, according to the witness's account.
Walker is described as speaking to Prince Andrew at Tramp nightclub in 2001, according to the witness's account.
Both were reportedly present and spoken to by Matthew John Walker at the same nightclub event in 2001.
The document states Walker trafficked the witness, and they visited the nightclub together.

events.title: Nightclub visit with Matthew John Walker
events.description: A witness visited Tramp nightclub with Matthew John Walker soon after moving to an unspecified location. Walker spoke to individuals the witness believed were Jeffrey Epstein and Prince Andrew. The witness observed Prince Andrew dancing with a woman.

keyFacts: A witness account from 2001 describes being trafficked by Matthew John Walker.
The witness visited Tramp nightclub with Walker, where Walker spoke to individuals believed to be Jeffrey Epstein and Prince Andrew.
The witness observed Prince Andrew dancing with a woman at the nightclub.
The document is dated January 8, 2020, and references the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
